entities.name: the dark mark
entities.description: The Dark Mark is mentioned as something that is being looked at by Mr. Weasley.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is a student who is being spoken to by Mr. Weasley and is shown to be upset by the treatment of Winky.

entities.name: winky
entities.description: Winky is an elf who is being treated poorly and is crying in front of Hermione.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr. Weasley is a wizard who is trying to calm the situation down and is speaking to Hermione and Harry.

relationships.description: Hermione is concerned about Winky's treatment and is looking at her with sympathy.
Mr. Weasley is speaking to Hermione and trying to get her to leave the clearing.
Mr. Weasley is trying to calm Winky down by suggesting that they take their things back to the tent.
Hermione is being spoken to by Mr. Weasley and is responding to his questions.
